title: LF bronzie duo partner.
body:
Looking for someone to play ranked with, would prefer to have skype but not fussed. 
I've been playing normals for about a year and have refined my mad skillz since last having really played ranked. I play mainly support but confident in my mid,top and adc roles. I can jungle but I haven't done it enough to really be much good at it.

(Just don't be one of those people who wants to use duo as a weapon, like strong-arming champ select to get roles, or to harass people or Afk or feed or throw a game because someone is using words to make you hurt-feel. )

replies.body:
Hey mate, 

I'm not a super serious player, I'm only online sporadically about 3-4 days a week in the evenings (sometimes during the day on weekends).

Currently chilling in Bronze III, playing mainly support but I can rock an ADC or fill most roles semi-competently.

Throw me a friend request if you like (IGN: CptFurious).
